All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable, DownloadHandler, GeoCodeListener, OnBallonListener, OnMapListener
public class MyLocationOverlay
extends Overlay
implements OnBallonListener, OnMapListener, DownloadHandler, GeoCodeListener

MyLocationOverlay.java: Draws an overlay that designates the user's location on the map.
